sections.title: Key Drivers
sections.instructions: What are the top three drivers your organization responds to?

sections.title: Unique Value Proposition
sections.instructions: What is the one thing that makes your organization unique? Explain what will convince your customers and your partners to choose your organization over others.

sections.title: Key Deliverables
sections.instructions: What does your organization provide to meet the key drivers? Describe the top three.

sections.title: Customer Segment
sections.instructions: Who will be your ideal customers? These should relate to the actors mentioned in your key drivers.

sections.title: Key Challenges
sections.instructions: What are important constraints or risks your organization is facing? Look to your key drivers, customer segment and unique value proposition to identify them.

sections.title: Key Partners
sections.instructions: Who can provide essential support, services or materials to your organization? What might you outsource or buy?

sections.title: Channels
sections.instructions: How does your organization deliver its value proposition to its customers? How do customers find out about your organization?

sections.title: Key Resources and Skills
sections.instructions: What does your organization need to sustain itself and create value for the customer? What skills do you need to create the key deliverables?

sections.title: Key Metrics
sections.instructions: How will you measure effectiveness of your response to your key drivers? Prefer simple, continuous and actionable metrics.

sections.title: Key Values
sections.instructions: Describe the culture of your collaboration, and how you will interact with the rest of the world. List three guidelines for behavior and/or ethical constraints you consider essential to the success of your organization.

sections.title: Cost Structure
sections.instructions: What are fixed and running costs for your organization?

sections.title: Revenue Streams
sections.instructions: How will you start and sustain your organization financially?
